name: Gunvolt 3 - Mighty Edition
description:
Gamepad/Keyboard  (All controls are in the game pause menu)

Play as Kirin from Gunvolt 3 in a Mighty Gunvolt-like demake version of the game ϟ

This tech demo is based on early footage from the Gunvolt 3 trailer, it is now outdated as GV3 presented more of its gameplay, so consider this demo to be its own thing; 

(HP are not programmed for the player, I didn't judge it necessary as the demo is short)

Have fun!

(Desktop version might come shortly later)
